parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Allows the AI to use IR lasers.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitOrGroup [[enableIRLasers]] value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitOrGroup: [[Object]] or [[Group]] - the unit or the group allowed to use IR lasers

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[group]] [[player]] [[enableIRLasers]] [[true]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isIRLaserOn]], [[enableGunLights]], [[isLightOn]], [[isCollisionLightOn]], [[setPilotLight]], [[setCollisionLight]]
</value></part></template>
